text: Wo ceng shi feng gong su lai man de qushi, feng zai shangwu zou yi yue de lucheng, zai xiawu ye zou yi yue de lucheng. Wo wei ta shi rong tongxiang quanshui yang yongchu. Youxie jingling feng zhu de mingling zai ta de mianqian gongzuo; shui weibeile wo de mingling, wo jiu shi shui changshi liehuo de xingfa.
